channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Open Source AI Editor: First Milestone】开源AI编辑器：第一个里程碑
item.description: 【We are open sourcing the GitHub Copilot Chat extension. It’s the first milestone in making VS Code an open source AI editor. Read the full article】我们正在开放采购GitHub副唱片聊天扩展。这是使VS代码成为开源AI编辑器的第一个里程碑。阅读全文

item.title: 【Agents at Work: Putting MSSQL MCP Server into Practice】工作中的代理：将MSSQL MCP服务器付诸实践
item.description: 【How often have you wished you could just talk to your data? Imagine extracting crucial insights, updating records, or building complex reports without wrestling with intricate query languages or relying on a dedicated developer. For many professionals, the true power of their enterprise data remains locked behind technical barriers, h】您多久希望您可以与数据交谈？想象一下，提取至关重要的见解，更新记录或构建复杂的报告，而无需使用复杂的查询语言搏斗或依靠专用的开发人员。对于许多专业人员而言，其企业数据的真正力量仍然锁定在技术障碍后面

item.title: 【2025 mid-year link clearance】2025年中链接清除
item.description: 【Visualizing all the books of the world in ISBN space. What it says on the tin. Back in 2013, there was a series of promotional videos for the golf European Tour titled "Every Shot Imaginable", in which golfers attempted silly tasks. item.title: 【Announcing Model Context Protocol Support (preview) in Azure AI Foundry Agent Service】在Azure AI铸造代理服务中宣布模型上下文协议支持（预览）
item.description: 【Generative-AI agents only become useful when they can do things—query systems of record, trigger workflows, or look up specialized knowledge. Until now that meant hand-rolling Azure Functions, managing OpenAPI specs, or writing custom pl】生成型代理只有在能够做事时才会变得有用 - 记录的Query Systems，触发工作流或查找专业知识。到目前为止

item.title: 【What's new in Azure AI Foundry | June 2025】Azure AI Foundry中的新功能| 2025年6月
item.description: 【TL;DR Key dev updates: Agent Service hits GA with Model Context Protocol (MCP) support—integrate any backend with standardized JSON-RPC calls, no more custom OpenAPI specs. New models include o3-pro for enterprise reasoning, Sora for video generation, and DeepSeek-R1 for open-source reasoning. Platform ch】TL; DR密钥开发更新：代理服务使用模型上下文协议（MCP）支持击中GA-通过标准化的JSON-RPC调用，将任何后端综合，不再有自定义OpenAPI规格。新模型包括用于企业推理的O3-Pro，用于视频生成的Sora和用于开源推理的DeepSeek-R1。平台

item.title: 【Exploring azd extensions: Enhance your Azure developer experience】探索AZD扩展：增强您的Azure开发人员体验
item.description: 【Exploring azd extensions: Enhance your Azure developer experience The Azure Developer CLI (azd) has a new feature called extensions that empowers developers to customize their workflow with azd. If you're a developer building on Azure, maybe you already have a "wish list" of CLI capabilities. If so, you might be able to create an ext】探索AZD扩展：增强您的Azure开发人员体验Azure开发人员CLI（AZD）具有一个名为Extensions的新功能，使开发人员能够使用AZD自定义其工作流程。如果您是Azure上的开发人员建筑，也许您已经拥有CLI功能的“愿望清单”。如果是这样，您也许可以创建一个ext

item.title: 【Microsoft 365 Copilot APIs: Unlocking enterprise knowledge for AI with the Retrieval API — Now in Public Preview】Microsoft 365 Copilot API：通过检索API解锁AI的企业知识 - 现在在公共预览中
item.description: 【At Build 2025, we introduced the Microsoft 365 Copilot APIs. Developers now have an extensibility layer that empowers them to create intelligent, AI-driven experiences deeply integrated with the Microsoft 365 ecosystem. These API】在Build 2025，我们引入了Microsoft 365 Copilot API。现在，开发人员拥有一个可扩展的层，可以使他们能够创建与Microsoft 365生态系统深入整合的智能AI驱动体验。这些API

item.title: 【Embracing the power of the empty set in API design: Requesting zero items】拥抱API设计中的空套的功能：请求零项目
item.description: 【A team was proposing a method that was at its essence a Read(n) that takes the maximum number of items to read. The reality was more complicated than that: The parameter n was really a configuration property on an operation, but it had the same meaning: It set the maximum number of items to return. The team s】一个团队正在提出一种本质上是读取（n）的方法，该方法需要最多的项目数量。现实比这更复杂：参数n实际上是操作上的配置属性，但是它具有相同的含义：它设置了要返回的最大项目数。团队

item.title: 【What’s New for Java Developers in Azure Cosmos DB (NoSQL)?】Azure Cosmos DB（NOSQL）中Java开发人员的新功能是什么？
item.description: 【The Java ecosystem around Azure Cosmos DB has quietly grown a lot stronger in the first half of 2024. And the updates are especially exciting if you’re working on scalable apps or exploring GenAI workloads. From new support for vector search and indexing, to better】Azure Cosmos DB周围的Java生态系统在2024年上半年悄悄地增长了很多。如果您正在研究可扩展的应用程序或探索Genai工作负载，则更新尤其令人兴奋。从对向量搜索和索引的新支持，到更好
